entries.journal_entry_description: Captain Bastra has given you a chance to prove yourself. The cargo was broken up into three lots. One aquired by some Jawa traders in a Sand Crawler. The second sold to the Valarian crime ring, and the last sold to the Darklighter clan.  You have the complete inventory. Now Bastra wants you to take the information to his slicer.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Good to see that you have gotten the complete inventory. You need it get it to my slicer. Problem is he decided to do some free lance work for some criminals and now they will not let him go. You need get to him, using any means necessary.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Bastra's Slicer needs some rescuing from his current employers, a group of gun runners near the Darklighter Estate..
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Got the data from Lavar. Looks like I had the wrong impression about you. Most of my people are in hiding from the Imps. You have to get to this Watto character and reterive the droid for me.
entries.task03_message_box_text: Bastra is still short handed so she wants you to continue the mission for her. You now need to travel to Mos Espa and recover the droid from this Watto character.
